body:
# Bug Report

## Description

If launch the Status application with a disabled internet connection, log in and close it - it will hang and not close

## Steps to reproduce

1. Make sure, that in settings -> Advanced -> Minimize on close is turned off
2. Turn off the internet connection
3. Open the status app
4. Login the app
5. Close the status app via close btn

<!-- example: step 1. do X step 2. do Y etc.. -->

#### Expected behavior

App closed

#### Actual behavior

App hangs and is not closing
